title: Gana Mukti Sangram Asom
text:
Gana Mukti Sangram, Asom (Assamese:গণ মুক্তি সংগ্ৰাম, অসম) was a regional Indian political party of Assam, founded on 20 March 2015, at <a href="Moranhat">Moranhat</a>, <a href="Assam">Assam</a>. This was announced by activist <a href="Akhil%20Gogoi">Akhil Gogoi</a> after a speech by Gandhian leader <a href="Anna%20Hazare">Anna Hazare</a> at the 4th 2-yearly conference of <a href="Krishak%20Mukti%20Sangram%20Samiti">Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti</a> (KMSS). "The party aims at changing the capitalist system of India" said Gogoi.
In 2017, during the 5th bi-annual Conference of <a href="Krishak%20Mukti%20Sangram%20Samiti">Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti</a>, <a href="Akhil%20Gogoi">Akhil Gogoi</a> announced that the party would contest in the next elections.
In 2020, Gana Mukti Sangram Asom merged wth <a href="Raijor%20Dal">Raijor Dal</a>.
